mingle.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if two feelings, sounds, smells etc mingle, they mix together with each other
mingle.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Add the mint and allow the flavours to mingle.
Her perfume mingled with the smell of wood smoke from the fire.
Her excitement was mingled with a slight feeling of fear.
mingle.translation[0].definitions[1].def: if you mingle at a party, you move around the room and talk to lots of different people
mingle.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: She was eager to mingle with the other guests.
